text: Tyńczyk Legnicki is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Krotoszyce, within Legnica County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south- western Poland. Prior to 1945 it was in Germany. It lies approximately east of Krotoszyce, south of Legnica, and west of the regional capital Wrocław. ==References== Category:Villages in Legnica County
title: Tyńczyk Legnicki
